scripts.clear: yarn exec make clean && yarn test --clearCache && yarn cache clean
scripts.build-trackers: yarn workspace @objectiv/tracker-browser build & yarn workspace @objectiv/tracker-angular build
scripts.build: yarn build-core && yarn build-plugins & yarn build-queues & yarn build-transports && yarn build-trackers
scripts.prettify: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose run prettify
scripts.prettify:generated: yarn workspace @objectiv/schema prettify:generated && yarn workspace @objectiv/tracker-core prettify:generated
scripts.tsc: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root  --verbose run tsc
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities --exclude @objectiv/testing-tools --exclude @objectiv/tracker-angular --verbose run test
scripts.test:ci: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities --exclude @objectiv/testing-tools --exclude @objectiv/tracker-angular --verbose run test:ci
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities --exclude @objectiv/testing-tools --exclude @objectiv/tracker-angular --verbose run test:coverage
scripts.check:dependencies: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/tracker-angular --verbose run check:dependencies
scripts.publish: yarn check:dependencies && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/utilities --exclude @objectiv/testing-tools --verbose run npm-publish
scripts.publish:verdaccio: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/utilities --exclude @objectiv/testing-tools --verbose run npm-publish:verdaccio
scripts.utils:generate: yarn workspace @objectiv/utilities generate && yarn prettify:generated && yarn tsc
